DOC.brief_summary: Objective ( ) : ( ) To assess effect adjunctive topical steroid combine treatment UVBnb dithranol remission time therapy till relapse psoriasis define 50 % loss PASI ( Psoriasis Area Severity Index ) improvement obtain antecedent treatment . ( ii ) To assess impact adjuvant topical steroid combine treatment UVBnb dithranol clearing time psoriasis lesion therapy ( PASI 75 ) . - Trial medicinal product
DOC.brief_title: Steroids Added Dithranol Narrow Band UVB ( Ultraviolet B ) ( UVBnb ) Psoriasis
DOC.detailed_description: ( ) To assess effect adjunctive topical steroid combine treatment UVBnb dithranol remission time therapy till relapse psoriasis define 50 % loss PASI ( Psoriasis Area Severity Index ) improvement obtain antecedent treatment . ( ii ) To assess impact adjuvant topical steroid combine treatment UVBnb dithranol clearing time psoriasis lesion therapy ( PASI 75 ) . - Trial medicinal product
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Moderate severe psoriasis chronicplaque / guttata type Exclusion criterion : Participation Goeckerman therapy regimen within 6 month previous present study
